'''''The Longest Day''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to complete the quest [[Jnagarbha Day]].

==Trivia==
The name of this achievement is a reference to the 1962 film ''{{w|The Longest Day (film)|The Longest Day}}''.
